moves.11... Bg7 12. Ne6 Qg8 13. d4 exd3 e.p. 1: White has sacrificed more material for an attack....
moves.16... Na6: Black tries to develop and expects to have to give back some material.
moves.21. Nxg7+ Kc7 22. Ne6+ Kb8: Black resigns, since White wins back material equality while the king remains trapped and with mate threats.
